# pose

**Instance Property**

The final pose of the equipment at the end of the toss simulation, in table space.

## Declaration

```swift
var pose: TableVisualState.Pose2D { get }
```

## Getting the outcome properties

- **id**: The identifier of the equipment that was tossed.
- **restingOrientation**: The final resting orientation of the equipment at the end of the toss simulation.
- **tossableRepresentation**: The tossable representation of the equipment that was tossed.
